lead_paragraph: State TV said that nearly 500 students in eastern China had developed illnesses, a few as serious as leukemia, and that a nearby field had toxins far above limits.

headline.print_headline: Pollution-Related Illnesses at Chinese School Put Official Oversight Under Scrutiny
headline.main: Chinese Parents Outraged After Illnesses at School Are Tied to Pollution

snippet: State TV said that nearly 500 students in eastern China had developed illnesses, a few as serious as leukemia, and that a nearby field had toxins far above limits.
abstract: Chinese parents are outraged after state news media reveals that nearly 500 students at Changzhou Foreign Languages School developed illnesses, possibly because of pollution.
